unitCountMatch.discrepancy: Missing 1 confederate leader and 1 union leader

issues.expected: Stuart (Corps, Cav, Ldr at N2013) should be a command leader
issues.actual: Not present in DOM; only his subordinate Rosser appears

issues.expected: Sheridan (Corps, Cav, Ldr at N3312) should be a command leader
issues.actual: Not present in DOM; only his subordinate DM Gregg appears

missingUnits.reason: Leader entry completely missing from DOM
Leader entry completely missing from DOM

result.summary: Critical: Two cavalry corps leaders (Stuart/Confederate and Sheridan/Union) are missing from the DOM snapshot. These are command leaders with no units directly under them (their subordinates appear in the data). Additionally, two location names show truncation (Flat Run Church→Flat Run Ch, Union Reinforcement→Union Reinf.). All other unit data (manpower, hexes, subordinate structure) matches correctly.
